name.ja: <ruby>究<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>極<rt>きょく</rt></ruby>の<ruby>青<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>眼<rt>がん</rt></ruby><ruby>伝<rt>でん</rt></ruby><ruby>説<rt>せつ</rt></ruby>

effect.en: Fusion Summon a Level 10 or higher Dragon Type monster by sending up to 3 Dragon Type monsters from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard as material. This turn, the monster Special Summoned by this effect cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
